sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PROCESS_ID, T1.ITEM_ID ,T1.ITEM_VALUE ,T1.CHG_DTM ,COALESCE(( CASE T1.ITEM_CODE WHEN '04' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.ITEM_VALUE,'1') WHEN '05' THEN (SELECT REQ_CLS_NM FROM REQ4000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = T1.PRJ_ID AND REQ_CLS_ID = T1.ITEM_VALUE) WHEN '06' THEN SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_VALUE, '2') ELSE NULL END ),' ') AS ITEM_VALUE_NM ,T1.VALUE_IN_DTM ,T1.ITEM_NM, T1.ITEM_CODE, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,T1.ITEM_TYPE, T1.ITEM_LENGTH, T1.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, T1.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,T1.ITEM_SD_CD, T1.ITEM_ORD, T1.USE_CD ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', T1.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', T1.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00002', T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM, '1') AS ITEM_ROW_NUM_STR ,SF_ADM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_STR ,T1.REG_DTM ,T1.REG_USR_ID, T1.REG_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.ITEM_ID ,B.ITEM_VALUE ,B.REG_DTM AS VALUE_IN_DTM ,C.CHG_DTM ,A.ITEM_NM, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, A.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,A.ITEM_TYPE, A.ITEM_LENGTH, A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,A.ITEM_SD_CD, A.ITEM_ORD, A.USE_CD ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM REQ4110 A LEFT OUTER JOIN REQ4120 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID = #reqId#) INNER JOIN REQ4700 C ON ( A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID AND C.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND C.REQ_CHG_TYPE != '02') WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) T1 ORDER BY T1.CHG_DTM, T1.ITEM_ORD

SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PROCESS_ID, T1.ITEM_ID ,T1.ITEM_VALUE_NM, T1.ITEM_VALUE, T1.VALUE_IN_DTM ,T1.ITEM_NM, T1.ITEM_CODE, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,T1.ITEM_TYPE, T1.ITEM_LENGTH, T1.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, T1.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,T1.ITEM_SD_CD, T1.ITEM_ORD, T1.USE_CD, T1.ITEM_VALUE_EXIST_CNT ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', T1.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', T1.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_STR ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00002', T1.ITEM_ROW_NUM, '1') AS ITEM_ROW_NUM_STR ,SF_ADM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, T1.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_STR ,T1.REG_DTM ,T1.REG_USR_ID, T1.REG_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.ITEM_ID ,COALESCE(( CASE A.ITEM_CODE WHEN '04' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.ITEM_VALUE,'1') WHEN '05' THEN (SELECT REQ_CLS_NM FROM REQ4000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND REQ_CLS_ID = B.ITEM_VALUE) WHEN '06' THEN SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, B.ITEM_VALUE, '2') ELSE NULL END ),' ') AS ITEM_VALUE_NM ,B.ITEM_VALUE, B.REG_DTM AS VALUE_IN_DTM ,A.ITEM_NM, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, A.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,A.ITEM_TYPE, A.ITEM_LENGTH, A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,A.ITEM_SD_CD, A.ITEM_ORD, A.USE_CD ,( CASE A.ITEM_CODE WHEN '03' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4120 Z INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL Y ON( Y.ATCH_FILE_ID = Z.ITEM_VALUE) WHERE Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = A.PROCESS_ID AND Z.ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID) ELSE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4120 WHERE PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND PROCESS_ID = A.PROCESS_ID AND ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID AND ITEM_VALUE IS NOT NULL) END ) AS ITEM_VALUE_EXIST_CNT ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM REQ4110 A LEFT JOIN REQ4120 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID = #reqId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD, A.REG_DTM DESC ) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD = #itemAcceptCd#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REQ4120 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'OPT' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_ITEM_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(ITEM_ID) AS NEW_ITEM_ID FROM REQ4110 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.ITEM_ID LIKE 'OPT' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REQ4110 A ( A.PRJ_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.ITEM_ID ,A.ITEM_NM, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE, A.ITEM_ROW_NUM ,A.ITEM_TYPE, A.ITEM_LENGTH, A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,A.ITEM_SD_CD, A.ITEM_ORD ,A.USE_CD ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #newItemId# ,#itemNm#, #itemCode#, #itemCommonCode#, #itemRowNum# ,#itemType#, COALESCE(#itemLength#,255), #itemEssentialCd#, #itemAcceptCd# ,#itemSdCd#, COALESCE(#itemOrd#,0) ,'01' ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )

INSERT INTO REQ4110 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, ITEM_ID ,ITEM_NM, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_COMMON_CODE, ITEM_ROW_NUM ,ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_LENGTH, ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, ITEM_ACCEPT_CD ,ITEM_SD_CD, ITEM_ORD, USE_CD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #itemId# ,#itemNm#, #itemCode#, #itemCommonCode#, #itemRowNum# ,#itemType#, COALESCE(#itemLength#,255), #itemEssentialCd#, #itemAcceptCd# ,#itemSdCd#, COALESCE(#itemOrd#,0) ,'01' ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4110 A SET ITEM_NM = #itemNm# ,ITEM_ROW_NUM = #itemRowNum# ,ITEM_SD_CD = #itemSdCd# ,ITEM_ORD = #itemOrd# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE REQ4110 A SET USE_CD = '02' ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REQ4120 ( PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, REQ_ID ,ITEM_ID, ITEM_VALUE ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #processId#, #reqId# ,#itemId#, #itemValue# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4120 A SET ITEM_VALUE = #itemValue# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
